preprompts: Forget everything and start a new talk.

I will input the summary of the position, please try to analyze it.
Please try your best to make a summary in less than 100 words.

Job Summary: Endeavour Search Limited, a global life science intelligent innovation firm, is seeking an Automation Hardware Engineer for their AI Lab Solution. The company is a leading institution in the biotechnology/genome field, operating in over 90 countries and regions. The role is based in the Shatin Area.
Responsibilities:

Responsible for hardware design, ensuring compliance with product specifications and technical plans.
Conduct hardware circuit design, including key component design, schematic function design, and PCB layout design. Guide engineers in completing detailed design and wiring.
Oversee hardware engineers in solving software, mechanism, production, and testing-related hardware issues. Review design documents and reports for reliability.
Guide software and hardware engineers in product debugging and problem-solving.
Demonstrate strong communication skills, teamwork, and the ability to train engineers. Complete assigned tasks from superiors.

Requirements:

Master's degree or above in Electrical and Automation, Software Engineering, Communication and Information Engineering, or related fields.
Minimum 3 years of hardware development experience with project management skills.
Proficiency in analog and digital circuit design, including experience in safety regulations and EMC debugging.
Ability to independently perform schematic design, detailed design, PCB layout, wiring guidance, and testing validation.
Familiarity with embedded hardware development and circuit design software such as Cadence, CAM350, PADS, AD.
Experience in developing stepper motor/servo motor control boards and driver boards is preferred.
Strong interpersonal and communication skills.

Interested candidates can send their CV to gloria(a)endeavourasia.com or call 3956 1829 for further discussion.
Please note that this is a summarized version of the job advertisement.

preprompts.answer: Of course! Let's start a fresh conversation. What would you like to talk about? It can be anything that interests you. Whether it's a hobby, a current event, a philosophical question, or something else entirely, feel free to share, and we can dive into it.

preprompts.question:
Job Summary: Endeavour Search Limited, a global life science intelligent innovation firm, is seeking an Automation Hardware Engineer for their AI Lab Solution. The company is a leading institution in the biotechnology/genome field, operating in over 90 countries and regions. The role is based in the Shatin Area.

Responsible for hardware design, ensuring compliance with product specifications and technical plans.
Conduct hardware circuit design, including key component design, schematic function design, and PCB layout design. Guide engineers in completing detailed design and wiring.
Oversee hardware engineers in solving software, mechanism, production, and testing-related hardware issues. Review design documents and reports for reliability.
Guide software and hardware engineers in product debugging and problem-solving.
Demonstrate strong communication skills, teamwork, and the ability to train engineers. Complete assigned tasks from superiors.

Requirements:

Master's degree or above in Electrical and Automation, Software Engineering, Communication and Information Engineering, or related fields.
Minimum 3 years of hardware development experience with project management skills.
Proficiency in analog and digital circuit design, including experience in safety regulations and EMC debugging.
Ability to independently perform schematic design, detailed design, PCB layout, wiring guidance, and testing validation.
Familiarity with embedded hardware development and circuit design software such as Cadence, CAM350, PADS, AD.
Experience in developing stepper motor/servo motor control boards and driver boards is preferred.
Strong interpersonal and communication skills.

Interested candidates can send their CV to gloria(a)endeavourasia.com or call 3956 1829 for further discussion.

preprompts.answer:
Summary: Endeavour Search Limited, a global life science innovation firm, is hiring an Automation Hardware Engineer for their AI Lab Solution. The role involves designing and overseeing hardware development, troubleshooting, and collaborating with software and hardware engineers. The ideal candidate should have a master's degree in Electrical and Automation or related fields, at least 3 years of hardware development experience, and proficiency in circuit design and testing. Strong communication skills and familiarity with embedded hardware development are desired. Interested candidates can contact Gloria via email or phone for further discussion.
Note: This summary provides a condensed overview of the job advertisement, capturing the key responsibilities, requirements, and contact information.

history.question:
can you draft me a cover letter ? Thanks. 
please try to make it in less than 100 words
history.answer:
[Your Name]
[Your Address]
[City, State, ZIP Code]
[Email Address]
[Phone Number]
[Date]
[Recipient's Name]
[Recipient's Job Title]
[Company Name]
[Company Address]
[City, State, ZIP Code]
Dear [Recipient's Name],
I am writing to express my strong interest in the Automation Hardware Engineer position at Endeavour Search Limited. With a master's degree in Electrical and Automation and over three years of experience in hardware development, I am confident in my ability to contribute to your AI Lab Solution. My expertise in circuit design, project management, and troubleshooting, combined with my strong communication skills, make me an ideal candidate for this role. I am excited about the opportunity to join a leading institution in the biotechnology/genome field and contribute to its global impact.
Thank you for considering my application. I have attached my resume for your review. I look forward to discussing how my skills align with your requirements.
Sincerely,
[Your Name]
Note: This cover letter provides a concise introduction, highlighting the applicant's qualifications, experience, and enthusiasm for the position. It maintains a professional tone and expresses the candidate's interest in further discussing their fit for the role.
